lines: Welcome to the terminal where the [color=#9A6BFF]7TH ANNUAL[/color] BeepBox Tournament will be held!
What are you looking to do?...
Great! Before you participate, I need to... [i]gather some information from you[/i]
Great! It seems you are... [i]Already signed up!?...[/i]
Great! It seems you are... real enough!...

Before you're ready to participate though, you must come up with a random [color=#9A6BFF][i]noun[/i][/color], [color=#9A6BFF][i]verb[/i][/color], and [color=#9A6BFF][i]adjective[/i][/color] as part of our [color=#25F3FF][b]Modifier System[/b][/color]!

The [color=#25F3FF][b]Modifier System[/b][/color] are extra words you can add to a round’s prompt to make it more of a challenge that allows participants to earn a currency called [color=#7744FF]Bonus Tokens[/color]!

[color=#7744FF]Bonus Tokens[/color] are fun to try to collect! They’ll have their own leaderboard that ranks people who go the extra mile for participation- [u]but they also determine the winner in rare cases of a tie in points![/u]
Okay! That’s all the information we’ll be needing for your participation in this.. competition
Thank you for time, and we’ll be seeing you in approximately [color=#9A6BFF]${TIME_STRING}[/color]...
Are you sure you want to withdraw from the tournament?... [color=#ffffff7c][i](You can always sign up again BEFORE the start of the tournament!)[/i][/color]
